document_data.name: Gaping Face Cascade
document_data.mainbody: '''Gaping Face Cascade''' was a waterfall in [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: This waterfall burst forth from a spring in the side of a rock face in the [[Troll Mountains (Amn)|Troll Mountains]] and was the start of the [[Fireflow|Gaping Stream]].
